aboutToolDescription: This is a simple text-to-speech tool. You can paste text into the input box below, and the system will automatically add it to the reading area. Use the control buttons below to start/pause reading, stop reading, select different voices, and adjust the speech rate.
footerTagline: Make reading easier | Powered by AI
howToUseStep1: 1. Copy text content from the clipboard
howToUseStep2: 2. Paste the text into the input box above
howToUseStep3: 3. Click the 'Add to Reading' button to add the content to the reading area
howToUseStep4: 4. Select your preferred voice and speech rate
howToUseStep5: 5. Click the 'Start Reading' button to begin reading
controlOptionPlayPause: - Start/Pause button: Start reading or pause current reading
controlOptionStop: - Stop Reading: Completely stop reading and reset to the beginning
controlOptionVoice: - Voice Selection: Choose different voice tones
controlOptionRate: - Speech Rate Adjustment: Adjust the speed of reading
highlightFeatureDescription: During reading, the currently spoken sentence will be automatically highlighted, making it easy for you to follow along.
pasteSuccessNotification: Paste successful, please click "Add to Reading" button to add content to the reading area
speechErrorNotification: Speech synthesis error, please try again later
copyFailedError: Copy failed, please try again later
